text:
="preserve">Antoni Stankiewicz JCD (1 October 1935 – 4 January 2021) was a Polish Roman Catholic prelate, theologian and lawyer. He was Dean Emeritus of the Tribunal of the Roman Rota from 2004 to 2010. He was born in Oleszczenice, Poland. He became a priest in 1958.
Stankiewicz died on 4 January 2021 in Rome at the age of 85.
